start.text: The people... they need to be sent. Or they will become fiends.
start.speaker: Yuna

yuna_dance.text: (Yuna performs the dance. Pyreflies rise from the water, carrying the souls of the dead.)
yuna_dance.speaker: Narrator

lulu_explain.text: Look. She guides them to the Farplane. It is a summoner's duty.
lulu_explain.speaker: Lulu

yuna_tired.text: I must be strong. For Spira.
yuna_tired.speaker: Yuna
